```{r}
load("~/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Documents/QSCI-454/flu.rda")
obs.di.nll <- function(r, N0, Nt, t){
  r <- r
  N0 <- N0
  ndays <- length(Nt)
  nt <- rep(x=NA, times = ndays)
  for (i in 1:ndays){
    nt[i] <- N0*exp(r*t[i])
  }
  nll <- -sum(dpois(Nt, lambda = nt, log=T))
  return(nll)
}
```
